channel.title: Need Help with Noclip
channel.description: Hey on my server Noclip is autoban. how do i take that away and make it useable?

item.title: Need Help with Noclip
item.dc:creator: @hmmer hmmer
item.description:
@hmmer wrote:

quest rs:

find noclip in your server’s commands and comment out the appendToBan line in the comand or completely remove the noclip command from your server. It’s a client sided command it will still work.

have you noticed how he asked how to make noclip safe thats like one of the simplist things to do in the world he might not even no what your going on about commenting out lines lol and he will probably just fuck up his whole server trying to get rid of it =/
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 18, 2008, 02:57:58 pm[/size][hr][quote=“Pwnage Sh0w, post:1, topic:226256”]Hey on my server Noclip is autoban. how do i take that away and make it useable?[/quote]

i made this to help you!

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Your name goes here")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " tried to noclip and has been autobanned!"); appendToBanned(playerName); disconnected = true; }

this makes it so that only you can noclip and all you have to do is delete from the first bracket to the last bracket for your noclip command in your client.java then just copy and paste this hope it helped:)

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help with Noclip
item.dc:creator: @quest_rs quest rs
item.description:
@quest_rs wrote:

find noclip in your server’s commands and comment out the appendToBan line in the comand or completely remove the noclip command from your server. It’s a client sided command it will still work.
